name: FinLeap GmbH
membership: FinLeap is an extraordinary member of the German Association of Banks (Bundesverbank der Deutschen Banken)and member of Bitkom e.V.
goal: FinLeap GmbH is a company builder headquartered in Berlin with additional offices in Milan. FinLeap builds, develops and grows companies in the Fintech and Insurtech industries, including credit institutions, insurance companies, insurance brokers and several platforms oriented to satisfy different consumer needs (both end consumers as well as businesses). FinLeap works closely with all the actors in the financial services industry, including Europeâ€™s largest banks and insurance companies. FinLeap is an extraordinary member of the German Association of Banks.
interests: Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives: FinLeap, under the representation of Ms. Sandra Kumhofer, has been selected to integrate the Regulatory Obstacles to Financial Innovation Expert Group.
